data.message:
All of you salty bitches acting like Eminem gives a fuck if you don't listen to his music.  He's worth $160 million. He doesn't care about you.  Walk it off. 
Also,  this is an announcement for a yelawolf album, but I know most of you can't read anyway.

replies.message: You should have used was worth 160 million. He lost alot of fans.  No ones butt hurt just smart enough not to take sides.
Again. $160 million. He could retire today and be fine. He isn't making music to coddle your worldview cupcake.
No one cares about yelawolf.
thanks for letting us know Aaron Mcmillen. I'll make a note of it
Trump is worth billions you think he gives a fuck what some washed up rapper says about him haha
I'm sure he doesn't care Joshua Blaze. That's the nice thing about capitalism. You don't have to listen to Eminem, and we don't have to care.
He doesn’t care about any of us
These fuckers keep saying he lost half his fan base but he still has 90million liking his Facebook.  How many country ass trumptards were really buying his music. Be real.
This is the white America he always talked about Arturo Mendez!
Be real? Ok, no one buys music these days, the moment new shit comes out its all over the internet for free dummy. Go suck on a hillary's clit.
What does Hillary have to do with this? And if it came down to it, I'd rather suck her clit than suck trumps dick. But you do you son. No judgement here.
Net worth. Not liquid assets. Your argument is mute. Period. Yea he has some money.
Benjamin Stratz you’re right Hilly isn’t a bad looking sis
Aaron Mcmillen 🖕🏿
Oh damn Joseph Montaldo sick burn bruh! We all know how much it sucks to have $160 million net worth.
Brian Quinn lol
Danielle Voegele this mofoe running his mouth like nobody cares about yeller. Shiiiiiiiiit speak for yourself boy.
Benjamin Stratz keep reppin that slum life baby boy. Me and my lady going to see him Sunday in San Francisco.
#slumerican aaayeee!
Love it! U said it! I agree!
I care for Yelawolf, idiot!

A bunch of Eminem haters on this fan page lol if you're not an fan stop being a little bitch follower . Shady Records will be making money for years to come. And if you guys hate Eminem because he hates Trump? Why don't you go Google all the amazing actors who also hate Trump who had told Trump to Fuck off.  You all of a sudden not a fan of Robert De Niro? Meryl stream? If you're not a fan of anybody who hates Trump then you're never going to watch another movie again without somebody in it who hates that bastard.

All the haters who are bitter are from America.  

I'm from Canada and we all hate Trump  same goes for the rest of the world. You go ahead and stop buying his albums I'll buy two from now on

If he doesn't care then why did he say something then? Course he cares, in fact he cares much more than the avg joe, his entire existence/career is based on wanting people to hear him, like his music, become accepted in rap culture, etc. he cares.
